mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS "idU", c.kind AS "kindU", c.kind_name AS "kindNameU", c.name AS "nameU", c.name_cn AS "nameCnU", c.value_1 AS "value1U", c.useful AS "usefulU", c.create_time AS "createTimeU", u1.real_name AS "createNameU", c.remake AS "remakeU", c.update_time AS "updateTimeU", uu.real_name AS "updateNameU" FROM t_global_constant c, t_user u1, t_user uu WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.deleted = '0' AND c.create_userid = u1.id AND c.update_userid = uu.id
